translation_by: Put your name here if translating :)

error.NOT_REGISTERED: **You're not registered with the bot!** Try `/login`.
error.INVALID_COOKIES: Whoops, that didn't work! Are your cookies formatted correctly?
error.UNEXPECTED_2FA: **Not expecting a 2FA code!** Try `/login` if you're not logged in.
error.LOGIN_RATELIMIT:
**Too many people are logging in at the same time**, and Riot is not happy!
Please try again later.
error.FORGET_FORGOTTEN: I can't forget you if you're not registered!
error.AUTH_ERROR_SHOP: **Couldn't fetch your shop**, most likely you got logged out. Try logging in again.
error.AUTH_ERROR_BUNDLES: **Couldn't fetch your bundles**, most likely you got logged out. Try logging in again.
error.AUTH_ERROR_NMARKET: **Couldn't fetch your Night Market**, most likely you got logged out. Try logging in again.
error.AUTH_ERROR_BALANCE: **Couldn't fetch your balance**, most likely you got logged out. Try logging in again.
error.AUTH_ERROR_BPASS: **Couldn't fetch your battlepass progression**, most likely you got logged out. Try logging in again.
error.AUTH_ERROR_ALERTS: **Your alerts won't work because you got logged out!** Please `/login` again.
error.AUTH_ERROR_ALERTS_HAPPENED:
**<@{u}> I couldn't check your alerts!** Did you change your password?
Please `/login` again.
error.AUTH_ERROR_RETRY_EXPIRED: **Unknown Retry operation**, did you wait too long before pressing Retry? Please `/login` again.
error.SKIN_NOT_FOUND: **Couldn't find a skin with that name!** Check the spelling and try again.
error.BUNDLE_NOT_FOUND: **Couldn't find a bundle with that name!** Check the spelling and try again.
error.MAINTENANCE: **Valorant servers are currently down for maintenance!** Try again later.
error.NOT_UR_MESSAGE_BUNDLE: **That's not your message!** Use `/bundle` to search for bundles.
error.NOT_UR_MESSAGE_ALERT: **That's not your message!** Use `/alert` to set your own alert.
error.NOT_UR_ALERT: **That's not your alert!** Use `/alerts` to manage your alerts.
error.NO_ALERTS: **You don't have any alerts set up!** Use `/alert` to get started.
error.DUPLICATE_ALERT: You already have an alert for the **{s}** in <#{c}>!
error.ALERT_NO_PERMS:
**I don't have the necessary permissions to send alerts in this channel!** Do I have the right role?
Make sure I can `View Channel`, `Send Messages`, `Embed Links` and `Use External Emojis` in this channel, then try `/testalerts`.
error.GENERIC_ERROR:
:no_entry_sign: **There was an error trying to do that!** I blame Riot.
`{e}`

info.BUNDLES_HEADER_DESC: Use `/bundle` to inspect a specific bundle
info.BUNDLE_CHOICE: Which bundle would you like to inspect?
info.NO_BUNDLE_DATA: Riot doesn't provide data for previous/unreleased bundles :(
info.ALERT_HAPPENED:
:tada: <@{u}> The **{s}** is in your daily shop!
It will be gone <t:{t}:R>.
info.ALERT_CHOICE: Which skin would you like to set a reminder for?
info.ALERT_SET: Successfully set an alert for the **{s}**!
info.ALERT_BP_SKIN: ***Note:** This is a battlepass skin, so it's not gonna appear in your shop!*
info.ONE_ALERT: You have one alert set up:
info.MULTIPLE_ALERTS: The alerts you currently have set up:
info.REMOVE_ALERTS_FOOTER: Click on a button to remove the alert:
info.ALERT_TEST: If you are reading this, **the bot has all the right permissions** to send alerts in this channel!
info.MFA_EMAIL: **Riot sent a code to {e}** Use `/2fa` to complete your login.
info.MFA_EMAIL_HIDDEN: **Riot sent a code to your email address!** Use `/2fa` to complete your login.
info.MFA_GENERIC: **You have 2FA enabled!** use `/2fa` to enter your code.
info.ACCOUNT_DELETED: Your account has been deleted from the database!
